author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanne Updates On Secondary Placing Of Ordinary Shares
text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Sanne Group PLC:
* ‍PROPOSED SECONDARY PLACING OF ORDINARY SHARES IN SANNE​ * CERTAIN EMPLOYEES TO SELL IN 3.6 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN COMPANY VIA AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD PLACING TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS​
* ‍PLACING IS BEING MANAGED BY INVESTEC BANK PLC ACTING AS SOLE BOOKRUNNER​
* ‍COMPANY IS NOT A PARTY TO PLACING AND WILL NOT RECEIVE ANY PROCEEDS FROM PLACING​
* ‍BOOKS FOR PLACING WILL OPEN WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
